rows.title: Add Ground Rules, previously agreed, to the WhatsApp Group Description

title.eng: Add Ground Rules, previously agreed, to the WhatsApp Group Description

text.eng:
Remember to add the ground rules to the WhatsApp Group Description. 

​​To add the ground rules to the Group Description:
 
Open the WhatsApp group chat. 

Tap the group name. 

Tap the existing description, or tap Add Group Description. 
Paste the ground rules. 

Tap Save.

rows.text:
Remember to add the ground rules to the WhatsApp Group Description. 

​​To add the ground rules to the Group Description:
 
Open the WhatsApp group chat. 

Tap the group name. 

Tap the existing description, or tap Add Group Description. 
Paste the ground rules. 

Tap Save.
